body: A hack way? Have you read the source code of [Network](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/keras/engine/network.py#L365)? `__setattr__` is overriden to collect variblaes in `tf.keras.layers.Layer`. Actually when you call `self.xxx = xxxx`, you are implicitly calling `__setattr__`, why can't we directly use it?
